h1: How Many Calories Are in a Chipotle Bowl?
assumptions: Standard Chipotle chicken burrito bowl: brown rice, black beans, chicken, fajita veggies, tomato salsa, cheese, lettuce. No guac, sour cream, or extra toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by customizations, portion sizes, and preparation at Chipotle. Values based on standard estimates; check Chipotle's nutrition calculator for exact builds.

quick_answer.text: A standard Chipotle chicken bowl contains about 665 calories and 45 g of protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison with Chipotle's info.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Chipotle bowl without rice?
faqs.a: Removing rice saves ~210 calories, bringing a standard bowl to about 455 kcal.

faqs.q: What's the protein content in a Chipotle chicken bowl?
faqs.a: Approximately 45 g of protein from the chicken, beans, and cheese.

faqs.q: Are Chipotle bowls high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, a standard bowl has ~1700 mg sodium, mostly from beans, salsa, and cheese.

faqs.q: How many carbs in a Chipotle bowl?
faqs.a: About 70 g carbs, mainly from rice and beans, with 10 g fiber.

faqs.q: Can I make a lower-calorie Chipotle bowl?
faqs.a: Opt for no rice, no cheese, extra veggies, and sofritas for under 500 kcal.
